video:video.video:title: GitKraken Git GUI Tutorial For Beginners
video:video.video:description:
In this intro video, you'll learn how to get started using the legendary GitKraken Git GUI for Windows, Mac AND Linux. Download GitKraken free at https://bit.ly/2Na5xBC
0:05 - Open, clone, init, init repo on GitHub/Bitbucket/GitLab/Azure Devops 1:03 - UI overview 2:08 - Staging changes 2:27 - Push and pull 2:44 - Drag and drop branches + Interactive Rebase 3:47 - Where to create branch, cherrypick, reset, merge, rebase, and start a pull request 4:45 - Fuzzy finder, keyboard shortcuts 5:07 - Glo issue tracking boards
#git #gitkraken #gitclient #gitgui #learngit #programming #github #bitbucket #gitlab #azuredevops #devops

video:video.video:title: How to Fix EAGLE Hangs or Crashes After Splash Screen Issue || Nuwan Tech Bro ||
video:video.video:description:
ABOUT THIS VIDEO Encountering EAGLE software startup problems? Learn how to troubleshoot and resolve issues where EAGLE hangs or crashes right after the splash screen, preventing it from starting. Follow our step-by-step guide to diagnose and fix this frustrating problem, ensuring smooth and uninterrupted usage of EAGLE software. Get back to your designs quickly with our effective solutions!
Issue: When launching/executing Autodesk EAGLE, the application: ‚ùå Starts and crashes/closes automatically after a few seconds on the splash screen. ‚ùå Only the initial/start EAGLE screen/logo is displayed, then it disappears, and no other window opens. ‚ùå No EAGLE task appears in the Windows Task Manager. ‚ùå A small start window appears (picture with "Autodesk" in the lower left corner) and closes again immediately, which hinders any login or configuration possibilities. ‚ùå Unable to open the application and it does not start.
Causes:
‚≠ï Faulty DLL associated with the system and/or the program (Windows Event Viewer may indicate that the "Eagle.exe" crash resulted from faulting module "LIBEAY32.dll").
üî∞Hello everyone, Subscribe to the Nuwan Tech Bro channel to watch videos summarizing knowledge, education, and technology.
Let's learn everything we know and don't know in one place. ‚ù§ ------------------------------------------- üéá Follow & Like
‚óºÔ∏è My YouTube Channel:: https://bit.ly/2Xu7zqg
‚óºÔ∏è Send Nuvan Tech a message on WhatsApp. Here is my WhatsApp link, send me any questions. https://wa.link/lnsk4m
‚óºÔ∏è Website :: https://www.nuwantech.ml/ ------------------------------------------- üéá If there is anything you don't understand in the video, I will tell you to leave a comment below.
üéá Please help me by sharing the video among all your friends.
üéá Chanel Tag #nuwan_tech

video:video.video:title: Powered Up & M5stack ATOM Matrix

Hey Seeekers!!!
In this video, I will show you guys a quick unboxing and a getting started of the Grove Starter Kit for Arduino by Seeedstudio. You will be able to know about our Grove ecosystem and also start playing with our Grove modules once you have an understanding from this video.

Don‚Äôt forget to participate in our giveaway and win an awesome Starter Kit to change your idea into a reality.
Giveaway duration:- 27/12/2018 to 17/01/2019
So, start commenting your project ideas in the comment section of this video down below and claim a Starter Kit.
*Use as many Grove modules in the Starter Kit as possible *Share project pages of hackster, instructables and other platforms in the video comment *We'll select projects we love to give away the kits.

video:video.video:title: ISOBUS Prototype and Test Development with CANoe .ISO11783
video:video.video:description:
The J1939-based ISO standard 11783 describes CAN communication in open networks for mobile use in the agricultural sector. One of the primary goals of ISOBUS data technology is to standardize the interface of tractors and implements produced by different manufacturers.
The video explains the basics of an ISOBUS system und describes how to simulate and test ISOBUS components like implement, Virtual Terminal and Task Controller.
Chapters: 0. Overview (0:14) 1. Brief introduction to the architecture of an ISOBUS system (1:04) 2. Typical test situation of an ISOBUS system (3:00) 3. CANoe functions for remaining bus simulation and testing (4:25) 4. Manually controlled ISOBUS machine test (6:44) 4.1. Walk through no faults (10:24) 4.2. Walk through with fault injection (16:09) 5. Automated ISOBUS machine test (18:44) 5.1. Walk through no faults (21:30) 5.2. Walk through with fault injection (26:04) 6. CAPL test implementation with the Test Table Editor of vTESTstudio (28:32) 7. Conclusion (31:51)
Further information: http://vector.com/isobus

iMooX wurde im Dezember 2013 von der Universit√§t Graz und der Technischen Universit√§t Graz gegr√ºndet und ist die erste und einzige √∂sterreichische MOOC-Plattform. Auf iMooX bieten wir kostenlose Online-Kurse (Massive Open Online Courses) zu einer Vielzahl von Themen an. Die Kurse sind kostenlos und k√∂nnen jederzeit und √ºberall besucht werden. Unser Ziel ist es, wissenschaftliche und allgemeine Inhalte einer breiten √ñffentlichkeit zug√§nglich zu machen und so vielen Menschen wie m√∂glich die M√∂glichkeit zu geben, ihr Wissen zu erweitern. Jedes Semester wird das bestehende Angebot der Plattform um spannende neue Kurse erg√§nzt.
Besuchen Sie noch heute http://imoox.at und lernen Sie etwas Neues!

video:video.video:description: Live-Interview mit Dieter Hess (Gesch√§ftsf√ºhrer, 3S-Smart Software Solutions) beim publish-industry VIP-Talk auf der ROTEN COUCH, SPS/IPC/DRIVES 2011

video:video.video:title: Introduction to IEC 61499
video:video.video:description:
In this short video, get a overview of what is IEC 61499 standard, why you should use it and what are its key benefits.
More training courses can be found at https://training.flexbridge.se

video:video.video:title: Franco Cavadini explains why IEC 61499 is the standard for Industry 4.0 at SPS 2019 | nxtControl
video:video.video:description:
IEC 61499 is the standard for Industry 4.0 when you deal with distributed automation and real time control. IEC 61499 is bringing a new concept for automation engineering and innovation. It is the real point of convergence between the physical and the digital domain by fully adopting the concept of digital twin.
IEC 61499 is the successor of the IEC 61131 standard. It provides the basis for modern automation. IEC 61499 based control technology can be used to program complete plant and equipment, even with several controllers in a distributed control system. Distributed intelligence is thereby enabled. An essential prerequisite for future trends like Industry 4.0, Internet-of-Things and Smart Grids.
Franco Cavadini (Chief Technical Officer, Synesis Consortium) who holds Ph.D. in Aerospace Engineering on the subject of artificial intelligence applied to robotic manipulation tasks from Politecnico di Milano is explaining how they are creating a physical demonstrator for Industry 4.0 where all the automation is based on IEC 61499 and the platform from nxtControl during the SPS 2019 international exhibition for industrial automation in Nuremberg.
‚ñ∫More information about intelligent engineering https://www.nxtcontrol.com/en/
‚ñ∫Click here to subscribe to nxtControl https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR_qJ0oY7N9Jx9ovBlA29xQ?view_as=subscriber #IEC61499

video:video.video:title: Overview of IEC 61499 and Eclipse 4diac
Distributed Automation Programming with IEC 61499
video:video.video:description: Demonstrating the property of IEC 61499 of enabling Distributed Automation.

video:video.video:title: Autonomous production module with wireless distributed IEC 61499 control and asset location
video:video.video:description: The autonomous production module with wireless distributed IEC 61499 control demonstrates the benefits of autonomy by the asset location manifestation. The module is seen as an enabler of flexible reconfigurable production floors. The demonstrator combines Iceblock nano-PLCs of flexbridge.se, EcoStruxure Automation Expert of Schneider Electric, and the battery powering and monitoring developed by Nikolai Galkin at the Lule√• University of Technology.

video:video.video:title: A Design Pattern for Monitoring Adapter Connections in IEC 61499
video:video.video:description: Today's software developments are frequently structured into different components with well defined interfaces. IEC 61499 comes with well defined interface mechanisms such as adapters that group data and event exchange between different subsystems. Compliance with interface specifications can be monitored at run-time. In this paper we present a design pattern to monitor adapters thereby observing whether communication specifications are fulfilled. We present an example demonstrating monitoring of a handshaking mechanism used between control application components.

video:video.video:title: Introduction to IEC61499
video:video.video:description: Prof Valeriy Vyakitin provides an in-depth introduction on the IEC 61499 that defines a domain-specific modeling language for developing distributed industrial control solutions

video:video.video:title: Energy and Load Management in Process Technology Using IEC 61499
video:video.video:description: Energy and Load Management in Process Technology Using IEC 61499, an experiment by Awite Bioenergie GmbH http://www.awite.de/ as part of CPSE Labs http://www.cpse-labs.eu/

video:video.video:title: IEC 61499 Industrial Control Systems and the MIDIH Integrated Architecture
video:video.video:description:
IEC 61499 Industrial Control Systems and the MIDIH Integrated Architecture
In the MIDIH Didactic Factory at the Politecnico di Milano, MIDIH partners set up a demonstration of how IEC 61499 based factory automation systems can be integrated with data-driven software applications following the MIDIH reference architecture.
An IEC 61499 based controller was retrofitted to the manufacturing line. It senses when the parts supply crate for an automatic assembly station is ejected for refilling. As the empty crate is ejected, an AGV is deployed automatically by the system to deliver new parts to the station. Instead of the operator having to notice the need and go to the storage area for the supplies, the operator just needs to load the supplies into the assembly station. The controller detects that the supply crate has been replaced, and the system lets the AGV return to the charging station automatically.
The Eclipse 4diac based controller contains an OPC UA server exposing the information that new supplies are needed, and other information derived from the sensor signals. The FIWARE OPC UA Agent forwards this information to an Orion Context Broker. The AGV fleet management system is subscribed to the Context Broker and dispatches an AGV when it recognizes that new supplies are requested. Self-documenting interfaces show data in context, making system integration more time-efficient and less error-prone. The IEC 61499 application is portable and can be deployed to an industrial PLC without changes after prototyping on the single-board PC, thanks to the Eclipse 4diac runtime.
fortiss Georg Neugschwandtner neugschwandtner@fortiss.org
Politecnico di Milano Simone Galparoli simone.galparoli@polimi.it
midih.eu Autumn 2020
This work was supported through the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and development programme under grant agreement number 767498.
www.eclipse.org/4diac/ www.fiware.org/developers/catalogue/
Music by Rob Belfiore via freesoundtrackmusic.com

video:video.video:title: Helft mir, einen Namen zu finden - Ank√ºndigung und Umbau

video:video.video:title: TS80P Smart Soldering Iron Unbox & Review (TS80 Ugrade with PD & QC)
video:video.video:description:
TS80P is the upgrade version of TS80 Smart Soldering Iron. TS80P is a smart soldering iron powered by USB Type-C PD2.0/QC3.0 standard input, which can be powered by charging plugs, power banks and mobile power supplies that comply with PD2.0 (12V 2.5A)/QC3.0 (9V 2A) standard. Its output power has been increased from 18W to 30W max, with an 8-second heating time at fastest from room temperature to 300‚ÑÉ, meeting a wider range of soldering. TS80P controller is made of aluminum alloy through CNC into a compact structure and high-tech design, ergonomic, beautiful and fashionable. The controller is also equipped with an OLED screen, so that you can monitor the status of the soldering iron at any time. Moreover, it features a brand new easy-push tip fastener, which provides a best holding experience and an easy push to loosen the soldering tip for quick replacement. With a built-in STM32 chip, TS80P can smartly control the rise and fall of tip temperature, and features sleep, automatic power-off, safety protection and other modes. The code application layer is open source; you can develop firmware for the soldering iron freely as needed. TS80P shares the same tips with TS80. The soldering tip has an internal thermal ceramic heating core, and through the pure copper heat conduction, it can quickly transfer heat to the tip of soldering tip, achieving an excellent temperature control performance.
Features: ÔÉòOLED screen, full body CNC aluminum alloy casing ÔÉòUSB Type-C PD2.0/QC3.0 standard input ÔÉòPower increased from 18W to 30W max ÔÉòOnly 8s to heat from room temperature to 300‚ÑÉ ÔÉòBrand new easy-push tip fastener, one push to loosen tips ÔÉòBuiltin smart chip for Port Protection ÔÉòShare same tips with TS80
Specifications: ‚óè Temperature Range: 100‚ÑÉ - 400‚ÑÉ (Max) ‚óè Input: 9V/2A (QC 3.0) / 12V 2.5AÔºàPD2.0Ôºâ ‚óè Power: 30W Max ‚óè Fastest heating time (from room temperature to 300‚ÑÉ): 8s ‚óè Data/Power Interface: USB Type-C ‚óè Temperature stability: ¬±3% ‚óè Display: OLED ‚óè Length: controller: 96mm; tip: 100mm(60+40mm) ‚óè Weight: 38g (power adaptor not included); Tip: 14g (B02 tip) ‚óè Certifications: CE, FCC
More information: http://www.miniware.com.cn/product/ts80p-soldering-iron-more/

video:video.video:title: PORTABLE SOLDERING IRON | SUNSHINE SS-S245
video:video.video:description:
1.Can be widely used in various chip-level maintenance, PCB manufacturing, mobile phone motherboard flying lead desoldering, etc.
2.Universal C245 series soldering iron tips, 110W high power, no need to wait, no need to work hard for large and small solder joints.
3.Inductive sleep mode, put the soldering iron stand to sleep, prolong the life of the heating core, save power and worry.
4.Plug and play, 2 seconds disassembly and replacement, convenient and fast, lead-free soldering iron head conducts heat quickly, oxidation resistance, easy to tin.
5.Multifunctional Soldering Iron Stand,Comes with a cleaning copper wire ball and a heating core cleaning hole, and can also place a replacement soldering iron tip to prevent loss and quickly replace it.
Product Link: https://www.exinxun.com/soldering-station/ss-s245.html
